title: Welcome to My Blog
text:

In this blog, I’ll be sharing:

My experiences
Tutorials and how-tos
Thoughts on various topics
And much more!

Stay tuned for more content coming soon.

title: Introduction to Python
text:
This is a sample blog post using Python in Quarto. Let’s explore some basic Python concepts.


Code
def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greet("Reader"))


Hello, Reader!




Python is a versatile programming language that’s great for:

Data analysis
Machine learning
Web development
Automation
And much more!

Stay tuned for more Python tutorials!
